at.jku.amp.lepatriinu

Class OnsetDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.jku.amp.lepatriinu.OnsetDetector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroundTruthPicker, HighFrequencyOnsetDetector, SimpleOnsetDetector, SpectralFluxOnsetDetector

    public abstract class OnsetDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Super class of all onset detectors. Contains instances of all available detectors and the peak picking functions.
    Author:
    Wolfgang KÃ¼llinger (0955711), Fabian Jordan (0855941)
